metadata.description: From the frozen streets of Edinburgh to the exuberant nature of the Samoa Islands; Rodolphe and René Follet take us on a breathtaking journey to the heart of the book and the life of Robert Louis Stevenson. one of the undisputed masters of mystery and adventure. A biography. or rather a novel of a life fed by literature and by dreams and nightmares alike.
metadata.name: Stevenson, The Pirate Within
